theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on progressive telomere shortening causing cellular senescence and loss of proliferative capacity, with telomerase role in maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening as a mitotic clock triggering immune cell senescence and immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere shortening as a mitotic clock limiting proliferation, leading to senescence and degenerative aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomere shortening and telomerase deficiency causing premature aging and tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening causing DNA damage response, tumor suppression, and aging-related tissue degeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening leading to senescence/apoptosis and organismal aging via telomerase regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows telomere attrition limits proliferative capacity; telomerase stabilizes telomeres to extend lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights telomere shortening as a mitotic clock limiting cell divisions to prevent cancer, linking to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere shortening causing replicative senescence and TERRA regulation of telomerase.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic replicative aging theory based on telomere shortening causing senescence and tissue decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere shortening as a counting mechanism triggering senescence as tumor protection.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Structural States and Proliferative Control Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere structural states (closed, intermediate, uncapped) regulating proliferative boundaries and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere deprotection triggering innate immune activation and chronic inflammation driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere dysfunction and DNA damage accumulation to senescence and systemic aging influenced by lifestyle.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere uncapping triggering DNA damage responses impairing stem cells and promoting aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere dysfunction causing senescence and genomic instability linking aging and cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere dysfunction amplifying aging hallmarks including inflammation and mitochondrial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere dysfunction activating DNA damage checkpoints impairing stem cell function and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Dysfunction-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details telomerase deficiency causing telomere dysfunction, DNA damage responses, and premature aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Attrition and Stress-Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links telomere shortening to progeroid syndromes and accelerated aging due to defective maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Attrition and Stress-Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stress-induced telomere erosion accelerating cellular aging and disease risk.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Attrition and Stress-Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on early-life stress causing accelerated telomere shortening and premature cellular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Attrition and Stress-Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows telomere shortening in non-dividing neural cells contributing to brain aging independent of replication.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length and Cellular Longevity Trade-off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes long telomeres extending cellular longevity but increasing clonal hematopoiesis and cancer risk.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length and Cellular Longevity Trade-off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on telomere sister chromatid exchange accelerating senescence independently of shortening, linked to premature aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length and Cellular Longevity Trade-off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes telomere position effect over long distances (TPE-OLD) regulating hTERT expression epigenetically with aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Length and Cellular Longevity Trade-off Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows TERT overexpression extends lifespan and repair, balancing anti-aging effects and cancer risk.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere Shortening and Replicative Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Models replicative age distribution in tissues based on cell division history linked to telomere shortening.
